entry.title: IPFIX monitoring with Docker ELK dashboards
entry.summary: Almost nobody needs a full-blown network monitoring stack for a home lab — but here we are. If you’re running servers, you should probably know what’s moving across your network before something else does. Using IPFIX into ELK gives you actual visibility instead of vibes, so you’re not blind to weird traffic, misconfigurations, or your own mistakes. Let’s set it up.
